fields.name: Do not send private messages to the developers.
fields.value: Just because they're open to communication doesn't give you the right to bombard them with messages. ***Do not send DMs to*** <@547844730663206938> and <@295159756669059073>. If you have bugs, issues, or questions, report them on the forum.

fields.name: Regarding Advertising or Partnerships
fields.value: If you want to advertise or become a partner, submit your application on the forum first. Then, the person in charge of advertising will contact you.
